turret.plugin.cy_plugin_proxy module¶

class turret.plugin.cy_plugin_proxy.CyPluginProxy¶

Bases: object

class turret.plugin.cy_plugin_proxy.PluginProxy¶

Bases: object

The proxy object of Turret PluginBase.

Parameters:
  • plugin (turret.PluginBase) – The object of PluginBase
  • proxy_params (dict) – The parameter of plugin proxy.”num_inputs”(int) and “num_outputs”(int) are required.
register_stream()¶

Register cuda stream on the instance.

Parameters:stream (cuda.Stream) – The cuda stream to be used on the instance.
unregister_stream()¶

Unregister cuda stream from the instance.

Parameters:stream (cuda.Stream) – The cuda stream to be used on the instance.

turret.plugin.plugin_base module¶

class turret.plugin.plugin_base.PluginBase¶

Bases: object

The superclass to create the plugin of turret.

configure(in_dims, out_dims, max_batch_size)¶

Configure the dimensions and the maximum of batch size.

Parameters:
  • in_dims – The dimension of inputs.
  • out_dims – The dimension of outputs.
  • max_batch_size (int) – The maximum of batch size.
classmethod deserialize(stream)¶

Deserialize the plugin using a stream.

Parameters:stream (binary stream) – A stream to read serialized engine.
enqueue(batch_size, inputs, outputs, workspace, stream)¶

Asynchronously execute inference on a batch.

Note

This is a abstractmethod. Be sure to implement on the subclass.

Parameters:
  • batch_size (int) – The batch size.
  • inputs – The input data.
  • outputs – The buffer to output data.
  • workspace – The workspace.
  • stream (cuda.Stream) – The cuda stream.
get_num_outputs()¶

Get the number of outputs.

Note

This is a abstractmethod. Be sure to implement on the subclass.

Returns:The number of outputs.
Return type:num_outputs(str)
get_output_dimensions(in_dims)¶

Get the dimension of outputs.

Note

This is a abstractmethod. Be sure to implement on the subclass.

Parameters:in_dims – The dimension of inputs.
Returns:The dimension of outputs.
Return type:num_outputs(str)
get_workspace_size(max_batch_size)¶

Get the workspace size.

Parameters:max_batch_size (int) – The maximum of batch size.
Returns:The workspace size.
Return type:workspace_size(int)
initialize()¶

Initialize the plugin.

classmethod module_name()¶

Get the plugin name.

Note

This is a abstractmethod. Be sure to implement on the subclass.

Returns:The plugin name.
Return type:module_name(str)
serialize(stream)¶

Serialize the binary to a stream.

Parameters:stream (binary stream) – A stream to write serialized engine.
terminate()¶

Terminate the plugin.

The class of custom layer factory.

create(stream)¶

Create the plugin from plugin factory.

Parameters:stream (binary stream) – The binary stream to deserialize plugin.
Returns:The created plugin.

Parameters:klass – The plugin.
